channel.title: Errors, and Questions if you can plaese help
channel.description:
[b] Ok, I have a couple problems and if anyone can help it would be appreciated. The problems are probably easy for most of you so I don't care if you call me a noob or what ever. Here are the problems.....
1st problem is this error with my runserver: [img]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/8495/errorin4.png[/img] If anyone knows what i need to fix please tell me...
2nd problem is isn't really a problem it's a question: [img]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/3751/portforwardgg1.png[/img] I Need to know what TCP ports and UDP ports are I bet you all know please tell me it will be appreciated.
3rd problem is another question: How can i change the drop percentage of an item that a monster drops.
4th and final is another question WOOOOOO!: My compiler doesn't work my friend has it and it work for him, but it doesn't work for me so can anyone either give me a new one or tell me what i need to do about my current one. Here is the Compiler:[code]@echo off title Deathstar if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code] Every time I run it is says i need to download Java and i have about 2 million times! This happens on every compiler I use what am i doing wrong.[/b]

item.title: Errors, and Questions if you can plaese help

item.description:
@Bluchaos wrote:

ok then does anyone know what to do on this part??[quote=“Bluchaos, post:1, topic:170261”][b]
2nd problem is isn’t really a problem it’s a question:

I Need to know what TCP ports and UDP ports are I bet you all know please tell me it will be appreciated.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Errors, and Questions if you can plaese help
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Kyle11594:

What source do you have? Some compilers work better on some sources.

Untrue… Java uses one compiler, its just the bat file that uses it… And I explained it in my post XD. Plus! The reason why some don’t work is because people don’t know how to change the line of the jdk1.6.0_03, or what ever there is in that compiler to the java type they have.

[quote=“Bluchaos, post:4, topic:170261”]2) where can i find thoughs port or what do i do on that stage of port forward?

3)the compiler says could not find a specific path[/quote]

Thats because, I told you to replace the jdk1.6.0_03, with the Jdk type you have. To find out which you have.

  1. Start
  2. Run
  3. Type: c:/program files/java
  4. Look for the jdk file
  5. put that folder name in the compiler instead of ‘jdk1.6.0_03’
  6. Your done

Read full topic

item.title: Errors, and Questions if you can plaese help
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

  1. Those are types of ports, TCP is used for port forwarding for private servers. (EX: 43594)

  2. Use this:

@echo off "C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_03/bin/javac" *.java pause

replace “jdk1.6.0_03” with the type of java you have

EDIT:

  1. Use this in your autospawn.cfg for that line
spawn = 299	2826	3593	0	0	0	0	0	1	Town_Guard

EDIT 2:

  1. Too lazy to explain, tutorial section. Use search…

Read full topic

item.title: Errors, and Questions if you can plaese help
item.dc:creator: @Bluchaos Bluchaos
item.description:
@Bluchaos wrote:

[b] Ok, I have a couple problems and if anyone can help it would be appreciated. The problems are probably easy for most of you so I don’t care if you call me a noob or what ever. Here are the problems…

1st problem is this error with my runserver:

If anyone knows what i need to fix please tell me…

2nd problem is isn’t really a problem it’s a question:

I Need to know what TCP ports and UDP ports are I bet you all know please tell me it will be appreciated.

3rd problem is another question:
How can i change the drop percentage of an item that a monster drops.

4th and final is another question WOOOOOO!:
My compiler doesn’t work my friend has it and it work for him, but it doesn’t work for me so can anyone either give me a new one or tell me what i need to do about my current one. Here is the Compiler:@echo off title Deathstar if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
Every time I run it is says i need to download Java and i have about 2 million times! This happens on every compiler I use what am i doing wrong.[/b]
